TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceController extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: Represents a Windows service and allows you to connect to a running or stopped service, manipulate it, or get information about it.

span.span: Represents a Windows service and allows you to connect to a running or stopped service, manipulate it, or get information about it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別來連接到並控制現有服務的行為。You can use the class to connect to and control the behavior of existing services. 當您建立的執行個體類別，您設定其屬性讓它與特定的 Windows 服務的互動。When you create an instance of the class, you set its properties so it interacts with a specific Windows service. 您接著可以使用類別來啟動、 停止及操作服務。You can then use the class to start, stop, and otherwise manipulate the service. 您很可能會使用元件中的系統管理容量。You will most likely use the component in an administrative capacity. 例如，您可以建立 Windows 或傳送自訂的 Web 應用程式的服務，透過命令執行個體。For example, you could create a Windows or Web application that sends custom commands to a service through the instance. 這會很有用，因為服務控制管理員 (SCM) Microsoft Management Console 嵌入式管理單元不支援自訂命令。This would be useful, because the Service Control Manager (SCM) Microsoft Management Console snap-in does not support custom commands. 您建立的執行個體之後，您必須設定兩個屬性，以找出與它互動的服務： 電腦名稱和您想要控制服務的名稱。After you create an instance of , you must set two properties on it to identify the service with which it interacts: the computer name and the name of the service you want to control. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，會設為本機電腦，因此您不需要變更它，除非您想要設定為指向另一部電腦的執行個體。By default, is set to the local computer, so you do not need to change it unless you want to set the instance to point to another computer. 一般而言，服務作者撰寫的程式碼，自訂特定命令相關聯的動作。Generally, the service author writes code that customizes the action associated with a specific command. 例如，服務可以包含程式碼來回應命令。For example, a service can contain code to respond to an command. 在此情況下的自訂處理工作執行前，系統會暫停服務。In that case, the custom processing for the task runs before the system pauses the service. 服務可以處理的命令集取決於其屬性。例如，您可以設定屬性服務`false`。The set of commands a service can process depends on its properties; for example, you can set the property for a service to `false`. 這項設定會呈現`Stop`命令無法使用該特定服務; 它會讓您停止從 SCM 服務停用必要的按鈕。This setting renders the `Stop` command unavailable on that particular service; it prevents you from stopping the service from the SCM by disabling the necessary button. 如果您嘗試從您的程式碼停止服務時，系統就會引發錯誤，並會顯示錯誤訊息 「 無法停止`servicename`。 」If you try to stop the service from your code, the system raises an error and displays the error message "Failed to stop `servicename`." ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來控制`SimpleService`服務範例。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to control the `SimpleService` service example. [!code-csharp[ServiceControllerClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceControllerClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Continue() cil managed

summary.span: Continues a service after it has been paused.

span.span: Continues a service after it has been paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫一項服務，其狀態會先變更為`ContinuePending`然後時方法傳回時，它會變成`Running`。When you call for a service, its status is first changed to `ContinuePending` and then, when the method returns, it is changed to `Running`. 您不能呼叫服務，直到服務控制站狀態`Paused`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以繼續已暫停的服務。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to continue a paused service. 這個範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ServiceControllerClass#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/CS/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ServiceControllerClass#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/VB/program.vb#5)]

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

param.span: The value must be between 128 and 256, inclusive.

span.span: The value must be between 128 and 256, inclusive.

summary.span: Executes a custom command on the service.

span.span: Executes a custom command on the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫，服務的狀態不會變更。When you call , the status of the service does not change. 如果此服務已啟動，則狀態保持`Running`。If the service was started, the status remains `Running`. 如果服務已停止，狀態仍會`Stopped`，依此類推。If the service was stopped, the status remains `Stopped`, and so on. 若要處理自訂的命令，必須覆寫服務方法，並提供所識別的命令處理常式`command`參數。To process the custom command, the service must override the method and provide a handler for the command identified by the `command` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法才能執行中的自訂命令`SimpleService`服務範例。The following code example shows the use of the method to execute custom commands in the `SimpleService` service example. [!code-csharp[ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand/VB/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使， ，和屬性，以在下一步參考時重設為其目前值。The method causes the , , and properties to be reset to their current values when they are next referenced. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以取得服務的狀態。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to obtain the status of a service. 程式碼會指示服務暫停，然後等候狀態來反映變更。The code instructs a service to pause, and then waits for the status to reflect the change. 這個範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. summary.span: Gets or sets the name that identifies the service that this instance references.

value.span: 識別服務的名稱這執行個體的參考。

span.span: The name that identifies the service that this instance references.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別到服務控制管理員中的服務。The identifies the service to the Service Control Manager. 變更這個屬性會導致繫結至另一個服務，它不會變更何種服務控制管理員的 Microsoft Management Console 嵌入式管理單元會顯示執行個體。Changing this property causes the instance to bind to another service, it does not change what the Service Control Manager's Microsoft Management Console snap-in displays. 當您實作自訂的服務時，這個屬性的值必須是相同的服務所記錄的名稱對應類別。When you are implementing a custom service, the value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the property of the corresponding class. 在程式碼，通常設定`main()`函式的可執行檔。In code, the is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable. 當您重設屬性，設定屬性的方法會設定這個執行個體為空字串 ("")。When you reset the property, the method that sets the property sets this instance's to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您在任何服務陣列未執行，您將無法啟動此服務。If any service in the array is not running, you will not be able to start this service. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來顯示的信差服務所依存的服務集合。The following example uses the class to display the set of services that the Messenger service is dependent on. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Status As ServiceControllerStatus

summary.span: Gets the status of the service that is referenced by this instance.

span.span: Gets the status of the service that is referenced by this instance.

value.span: 其中一個值，指出是否在服務正在執行，已停止或暫停，或是啟動、 停止、 暫停或繼續命令的是否已暫止。

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether the service is running, stopped, or paused, or whether a start, stop, pause, or continue command is pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 狀態指出服務的目前狀態。The status indicates the current state of the service. 可能值的集合會包含指出狀態變更的命令是暫止的數個。The set of possible values includes several that indicate whether a state-changing command is pending. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來檢查 Telnet 服務的目前狀態。The following example uses the class to check the current status of the Telnet service. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動該服務。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. 如果服務正在執行，此範例會停止服務。If the service is running, the example stops the service. [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: Stops this service and any services that are dependent on this service.

span.span: Stops this service and any services that are dependent on this service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何服務相依於此服務作業，它們會先停止此服務停止。If any services depend on this service for their operation, they will be stopped before this service is stopped. 屬性包含的服務依存於這個集合。The property contains the set of services that depend on this one. 如果您停止此服務依存於服務時，呼叫方法在此服務內父服務的方法。If you stop a service that this service depends on, call the method on this service within the method of the parent service. 屬性包含此服務依存的服務。The property contains the services that this service depends on. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來檢查 Telnet 服務的目前狀態。The following example uses the class to check the current status of the Telnet service. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動該服務。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. 如果服務正在執行，此範例會停止服務。If the service is running, the example stops the service. [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WaitForStatus(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus) cil managed

span.span: The status to wait for.

summary.span: Infinitely waits for the service to reach the specified status.

span.span: Infinitely waits for the service to reach the specified status.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用暫止應用程式的處理，直到服務已達到所需的狀態。Use to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status. > [!NOTE] > 方法會等候大約 250 毫秒之間每個狀態檢查。The method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check. 無法偵測的觀察到的服務變更為大小寫`desiredStatus`，然後立即另一個狀態的間隔中。 cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來檢查是否警訊器服務已停止。The following example uses the class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動服務，並等待，直到服務狀態設為。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to . [!code-cpp[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void WaitForStatus (System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus, TimeSpan timeout);

Public Sub WaitForStatus (desiredStatus As ServiceControllerStatus, timeout As TimeSpan)

span.span: The status to wait for.

param.name: timeout
param.span: A object specifying the amount of time to wait for the service to reach the specified status.

span.span: A object specifying the amount of time to wait for the service to reach the specified status.

summary.span: Waits for the service to reach the specified status or for the specified time-out to expire.

span.span: Waits for the service to reach the specified status or for the specified time-out to expire.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用暫止應用程式的處理，直到服務已達到所需的狀態。Use to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status. > [!NOTE] > 方法會等候大約 250 毫秒之間每個狀態檢查。The method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check. 無法偵測的觀察到的服務變更為大小寫`desiredStatus`，然後立即另一個狀態的間隔中。 cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval.
